name: The 7th Int'l Conference on Environmental Chemistry and Ecotoxicology
content: The 7th Int'l Conference on Environmental Chemistry and Ecotoxicology (CECE 2024) will be held during April 19-21, 2024 in Xiamen, China. This Conference will cover issues on Environmental Chemistry and Ecotoxicology, and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
